doc.field: Regarding the importance of organizational turnover, the related physical and spiritual costs in long term, and necessity for prediction and control of turnover to retain key employees, the present study was conducted to investigate, explain and prioritize the factors affecting employees’ turnover intention in Ahvaz pipe industrial Company in the context of a correlation type applied survey. Data were collected by submitting a questionnaire among ۲۷۱ employees. The results of data analysis by SPSS and LISREL software confirmed construct validity of the research variables and revealed that feeling of working with organization has the highest priority with Friedman rank of ۵٫۴۹۸; followed by supervisor’s characteristics (۳٫۹۹۴) , work-related shocks (۳٫۹۰۲) , and job properties (۳٫۸۵۶). Job-related feelings and emotions had the lowest importance.
